tool_description: Get all the latest news from Glasgow
name: Glasgow live news
title: Glasgow live news

api_list.name: Get individual news Source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://glasgow-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/Celtic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glasgow-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://glasgow-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{glasgowliveid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glasgow-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
